Event.name: Inhibit_motion_scenario
Event.definition: <def-root>This scenario concerns an <fen>Agent</fen> inhibiting the motion of a <fen>Theme</fen> against the desire, plan, or tendency to be free. After a period of time, the <fen>Agent</fen> may choose to release the <fen>Theme</fen>, or the <fen>Theme</fen> may escape or be broken free by an intervening cause.</def-root>

Arg.name: Theme
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Theme</fen> has a tendency or desire to move, but is prevented from doing so.</def-root>

Arg.name: Cause
Arg.definition: <def-root>A non-volitional cause that inhibits the motion of the <fen>Theme</fen>.</def-root>
